remarks:
Positive real 'less than' is a strict ordering.  Part of Proposition 9-3.3 of [Gleason] p. 122.  (Contributed by NM, 25-Feb-1996.) (New usage is discouraged.) 

---

 Positive real 'less than' is a weak linear order (in the sense of ~ df-iso ).  Proposition 11.2.3 of [HoTT], p.  (varies).  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 16-Dec-2019.)
